account.label: Account ID
account.comment: Please make sure to use only digits here. No dashes are allowed.

max_package_weight.label: Maximum Package Weight (Please consult your shipping carrier for maximum supported shipping weight)

smartpost_hubid.label: Hub ID
smartpost_hubid.comment: The field is applicable if the Smart Post method is selected.

free_shipping_enable.label: Free Shipping with Minimum Order Amount

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Minimum Order Amount for Free Shipping

free_shipping_enable.label: Free Shipping with Minimum Order Amount

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Minimum Order Amount for Free Shipping

max_package_weight.label: Maximum Package Weight (Please consult your shipping carrier for maximum supported shipping weight)

min_package_weight.label: Minimum Package Weight (Please consult your shipping carrier for minimum supported shipping weight)

client_id.label: Client ID
client_id.comment:
To obtain your Client ID/Secret you have to:
- Register to https://developer.ups.com
- Go to My Apps -> Add Apps and fill all data
- Add Rating, Authorization, Shipping, TimeInTransit, Tracking products to the app

mode.label: Mode
mode.comment: Enables/Disables SSL verification of Maho server by UPS.

client_id.label: Client ID (Consumer Key)
client_id.comment: Register your application at developers.usps.com to obtain OAuth credentials. Copy the Consumer Key as your Client ID and the Consumer Secret as your Client Secret. Use the same credentials for both test and production environments.

api_environment.label: API Environment
api_environment.comment: Use Test (TEM) environment for testing with the same credentials. Test labels will be watermarked and not processed for payment.

commercial_pricing.label: Use Commercial Pricing
commercial_pricing.comment: Enable to receive discounted commercial rates instead of retail counter pricing. Recommended for online label printing.

payment_account_type.label: Payment Account Type
payment_account_type.comment: Required for shipping label generation. EPS (Enterprise Payment System) or PERMIT.

payment_account_number.label: Payment Account Number
payment_account_number.comment: Your EPS or PERMIT account number for paying postage.

payment_permit_zip.label: Permit ZIP Code
payment_permit_zip.comment: Required only for PERMIT account type.

payment_crid.label: CRID (Customer Registration ID)
payment_crid.comment: Your USPS Customer Registration ID for label generation.

payment_mid.label: MID (Mailer ID)
payment_mid.comment: Your USPS Mailer ID for label generation.

max_package_weight.label: Maximum Package Weight (Please consult your shipping carrier for maximum supported shipping weight)

free_shipping_enable.label: Free Shipping with Minimum Order Amount

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Minimum Order Amount for Free Shipping

handling_action.label: Handling Applied
handling_action.comment: "Per Order" allows single handling fee for entire order. "Per Package" allows individual handling fee for each package.

divide_order_weight.label: Divide Order Weight
divide_order_weight.comment: Allows breaking total order weight into smaller pieces if it exeeds 70 kg to ensure accurate calculation of shipping charges.

ready_time.label: Ready time
ready_time.comment: Package ready time after order submission (in hours)

free_shipping_enable.label: Free Shipping with Minimum Order Amount

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Minimum Order Amount for Free Shipping
